import java.io.*;
import java.util.*;
class svssd{
static String searchon="";
public static void pre(int N){
searchon = "1";
for(int i = 2;i<=N;i++) 
searchon=searchon+Integer.toString(i);
//System.out.println(searchon);
}
public static void prec(String s){
searchon = s;
}
public static void main(String args[])throws IOException{
Scanner cons = new Scanner(System.in);
//System.out.println("Lets test!");
int perimeter = cons.nextInt();
int length = perimeter>>2;
int area = length*length;
System.out.println(area);
}
public static int solve(String K){
int l = K.length();
int cnt = 0;
for(int i = 0;i+l<=searchon.length();i++)
if(searchon.substring(i,i+l).equals(K)) cnt++;
return cnt;
}
}
